Package pure_mp3

Interface Summary
MusicPlayer Interface for a Player.
 

Class Summary
FileCrawler The FileCrawler which adds Songs to the PlayList and to Media
Global Some Global Vars and Constants
GUI The GUI for the Player
Info The Info for displaying which song is being played
Launch Launching Class
ListMoveDataFlavor  
ListMoveTransferable  
ListMoveTransferData  
ListMoveTransferHandler  
MainPanel The MainPanel for the Player
Media Media consists of the MediaBar and the MediaTable
MediaBar The MediaBar that is part of Media.
MediaTable The MediaTable that is part of Media
Menu The MenuBar for the Player
Player The Player.
PlayerMenu PlayerMenu for the Player
PlayList PlayList for the Player.
PlayListDropTargetListener Listens for Drops of Music Files
PlayListRenderer Renders the PlayList from the Songs
Progress The Slider which displays the current position in the song
SlideUpdater Thread used for updating Progress
Song The Song Class.
StreamMusicPlayer MusicPlayer inspired by Matthias Pfisterer's examples on JavaSound (jsresources.org).
